spatial_accuracy.notes: Major plan-to-render mismatches. The 2D plan shows 4 bedrooms (BED-1/2/3/4) plus two distinct decks; the 3D render appears to show only 3 bedrooms and lacks the long, angled top deck geometry. Overall footprint is more rectangular in 3D, losing the plan’s top-side angle and deck offsets. Several room adjacencies (right-side bedroom/bath cluster and deck connections) do not match the 2D layout. Door and window positions are broadly plausible but do not correspond to the specific openings shown in plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Missing room(s) and exterior spaces indicate low structural fidelity. The plan’s right-side BED-4 + nearby common toilet arrangement is not faithfully reproduced (BED-4 appears missing/merged). The two-deck configuration (large central deck and smaller deck off BED-1) is not preserved. Wall layout is simplified, losing key offsets/angled segment. Some internal partitions/bathroom placements appear reinterpreted rather than matched. A likely hallucinated small room/area (with bicycle) appears that is not present on the 2D plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Living/dining and kitchen furniture roughly aligns with the general concept (sofa group, dining table, linear kitchen), but bedroom count mismatch makes overall furniture mapping incorrect. Several rooms’ contents (storage/extra area) do not correspond to labeled spaces in the plan. Scale looks internally consistent, but it is not consistent with the specific room dimensions/proportions shown on the 2D plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Render quality is strong: clean materials, good lighting, and clear composition. Camera is isometric-like but shows perspective (not true orthographic/isometric). Geometry is mostly clean with few visible artifacts. Visual clarity is good, but architectural correctness is not.

detected_errors.description: Missing BED-4 (2D plan has 4 bedrooms; 3D render appears to show only 3).
Missing/incorrect deck system: 2D has a long, angled top deck plus a smaller deck near BED-1; 3D shows different/simplified balcony placement and geometry.
Overall footprint proportion/shape distortion: 2D includes an angled top edge and stepped exterior walls; 3D is more rectilinear and loses these offsets.
Misplaced exterior openings: sliding doors/windows to decks do not align with the 2D plan’s top-side deck openings and their distribution.
Bathroom cluster mismatch on the right side: the 2D plan’s TOI-1 + common toilet (C.TOI) adjacency to BED-1/BED-4 corridor is not faithfully reproduced.
FOYER/entry zoning shown in 2D is not clearly represented as a distinct space in 3D (entry sequence appears reinterpreted).
Hallucinated element/space: a small dedicated area with a bicycle (or similar extra niche/room) appears in 3D but is not indicated on the 2D plan.
Door orientation/placement inconsistencies: several interior doors (bedrooms/baths) do not match the hinge-side/orientation implied by the 2D plan.
